channel.title: Toll Plaza on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Toll Plaza on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Carquinez Bridge Toll Plaza
item.description: Approaching the Carquinez Bridge Toll Plaza on I-80 east. When this photo was taken in Fall 2010, the auto toll was $5.00. The Carquinez Bridge crosses the Carquinez Straits, through which the Sacramento and San Joaquin Delta empty into, before reaching the San Pablo Bay.

item.title: I-90 MassPike TollPlaza Approaching I-95
item.description: I-95/MA-128 North/South Split after MassPike Toll Plaza
